interface.name: DifferentiableUnivariateVectorFunction
interface.javadoc:
Extension of {@link UnivariateVectorFunction} representing a differentiable univariate vectorial function.

2.0
as of 3.1 replaced by {@link org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.differentiation.UnivariateDifferentiableVectorFunction}

Returns the derivative of the function
